name: Templify
desc: A Monday.com application developed with React, integrated into Monday.com's item view. This app enables users to effortlessly create, save, and apply templates, reducing redundant efforts.

name: Customer Success Portal
desc: Consolidate customer onboarding and support onto a unified platform. Develop analytics for team performance and customer satisfaction to enhance decision-making for improved business outcomes.

name: WhatsApp Onboarding Portal
desc: Help simplify the process of enabling WhatsApp business account for Engati's as well as it's Whitelabel partner's customers.

name: Billing Portal
desc: Enhance the current process to incorporate global customer invoicing using Stripe API integrations. Establish statistics to support informed business decision-making.
